ygData.subject: RE: Lord Nagafens Demise
ygData.msgSnippet: My thoughts exactly.  The MLMers and the spammers have made the Internet a much less friendly place.  To have it intrude into this haven from reality was a
ygData.messageBody:
My thoughts exactly. The MLMers and the spammers have made the Internet a
much less friendly place. To have it intrude into this haven from reality
was a jarring and unwelcome note.

Paralto of Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [mailto:kblair@...]

> So what if my signature file has a few lines of
> advertising.

It may have something to do with your reply of 3 words,
and then followed by your signature of 41 words. 41 words
of advertising spam that nobody likes to see regardless
of the length of your message. If I wanted to find out
about "great ways to make millions" I could turn off
the spam filter in my email client and get 50 a day to
choose from.
